alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 4:56PM CDT until March 30 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL RANKIN AND EAST CENTRAL HINDS COUNTIES... At 455 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Flowood, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Broadcast media confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Pearl, Brandon, Flowood, Richland, Florence, Pelahatchie and Monterey. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
